scripts.add-attachments: npm add @cap-js/attachments && cp xmpls/attachments.cds ./srv && cp -r xmpls/content ./db/data/content
scripts.clone-add-attachments: git clone https://github.com/cap-js/attachments.git && cp -r attachments/xmpl/db . && cp -r attachments/xmpl/app . && npm add https://github.com/cap-js/attachments.git
scripts.add-notifications: npm add @cap-js/notifications && cp xmpls/alert-notifications.js ./srv && cp xmpls/notification-types.json ./srv
scripts.reset: read -p 'This will irreversibly reset your working directory including ALL files in this git repo. Continue?' -n 1 -r && echo && if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then git clean -fd && git reset --hard && npm i; fi
